tr_quotes.quote: Hayırlı bir iş yapmak istiyorsan bugünün işini yarına bırakma; çünkü yarına kadar ne olacağı belli değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Ali

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan, bir işin delisi olmadan akıllısı olamıyor.
tr_quotes.author: Ali Suad

tr_quotes.quote: İş hayatı denilen şeyin iş değil, hayat olduğunu geç kalmadan öğrenin.
tr_quotes.author: B. C. Forbes

tr_quotes.quote: İşine hâkim ol, işinin sana hâkim olmasına izin verme.
tr_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

tr_quotes.quote: İşinin yapılmasını istiyorsan kendin git, istemiyorsan başkasını gönder.
tr_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

tr_quotes.quote: Her insan, üstün bir işi yapamaz ama basit bir işi üstün bir ruhla yapabilir.
tr_quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

tr_quotes.quote: Yapılacak işler, yapılanların yanında ne kadar da çok!
tr_quotes.author: Cecil Rhodes

tr_quotes.quote: Başkasından daha fazla iş yapmıyorsanız ondan üstün olduğunuzu ispat etmek için boşuna çabalamayın.
tr_quotes.author: Cervantes

tr_quotes.quote: Üzerinde durduğun işi seversen onu daha iyi bir hâle getirmekten zevk duyarsın.
tr_quotes.author: Charles Schwab

tr_quotes.quote: Bir işe girişmek için iyi bir gerekçemiz yoksa ona başlamamak için iyi bir nedenimiz var demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Cicero

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer kafa işçisiyseniz yaptığınız işin çokluğu ile nadiren yorulursunuz, yapmadığınız işin miktarı sizi daha çok yorar.
tr_quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

tr_quotes.quote: İşsiz adam durgun su gibidir, bozulup kirlenir.
tr_quotes.author: De Laterne

tr_quotes.quote: Çabukluğu iş başında geçen zamanla değil, işin ilerlemesiyle ölçmek gerekir.
tr_quotes.author: Francis Bacon

tr_quotes.quote: Bize değer kazandıran şeyler, yaptığımız işlerdir.
tr_quotes.author: G. Bancroft

tr_quotes.quote: İşlerin yükü ruha iyi gelir, kurtulduğu zaman daha serbestçe oynar ve hayatın tadını alır.
tr_quotes.author: Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Zor iş, zamanında yapmamız gerekip de yapmadığımız kolay işlerin birikmesiyle oluşur.
tr_quotes.author: Henry Ford

tr_quotes.quote: İşine bağlı olan insanın kafasına düşünceler kendiliğinden doğar.
tr_quotes.author: Henry Ford

tr_quotes.quote: Kendimiz hakkında yapabileceğimize inandığımız şeylere göre hüküm veririz, başkaları ise bizim hakkımızda yapmış olduğumuz işlere göre hüküm verirler.
tr_quotes.author: Henry W. Longfellow

tr_quotes.quote: Yaptığınız iş, ne kadar insanı mutlu ediyorsa o derecede büyük ve değerlidir.
tr_quotes.author: Hutcheson

tr_quotes.quote: Şeytan, işlerini gördürmek için işsiz elleri seçer.
tr_quotes.author: Isaac Watts

tr_quotes.quote: Bir metre iş yapmayı, bir kilometre söz vermeye değişmem.
tr_quotes.author: James Howell

tr_quotes.quote: Bir insanı doyurmak istiyorsanız ona her gün balık vermeyin, balık tutmayı öğretin.
tr_quotes.author: Konfüçyüs

tr_quotes.quote: Bilgili insanlar işini maaş karşılığı değil, bir hayat görevi olarak yerine getirir.
tr_quotes.author: Konfüçyüs

tr_quotes.quote: Yapılan iş ne kadar parlak olursa olsun, yüksek bir amacın sonucu değilse büyük sayılmamalıdır.
tr_quotes.author: La Rochefoucauld

tr_quotes.quote: Küçük işleri iyi yapmak, büyük işleri daha iyi yapabilmeye giden yoldur.
tr_quotes.author: Lamb

tr_quotes.quote: Büyük işler başarıp şeref kazandıktan sonra çekilmeyi bilmeli.
tr_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

tr_quotes.quote: İşi çok olanların gözyaşları için zamanları yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Lord Byron

tr_quotes.quote: İşi görmek istiyorsanız az kişiyle, laf etmek istiyorsanız çok kişiyle ekip kurunuz.
tr_quotes.author: Mancur Olson

tr_quotes.quote: İş, bir kere geri kalırsa hiçbir zaman ilerlemez.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Ömer

tr_quotes.quote: Dikkatsiz ve özensiz yapılan işler, bizi her zaman yükümlülük altına sokar.
tr_quotes.author: Samuel Smiles

tr_quotes.quote: Kalbinizi işinizin, işinizi de kalbinizin içine yerleştirmelisiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas John Watson

tr_quotes.quote: İş, ibadetin en mukaddesidir.
tr_quotes.author: Tolstoy

tr_quotes.quote: İş, bizi üç felaketten uzaklaştırır; can sıkıntısı, kötülük ve ihtiyaç.
tr_quotes.author: Voltaire

tr_quotes.quote: Mutlu olmak ve sağlığınızı korumak isterseniz en az iki üç zevkli işle uğraşmanız şarttır.
tr_quotes.author: William Churchill

tr_quotes.quote: İş, keyfi engeller ama farklı keyifler getirir.
tr_quotes.author: William Feather

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer işiniz başka hiçbir şeye zaman bırakmayacak kadar yoğunsa sizinle ya da işinizle ilgili yanlış giden bir şeyler var demektir.
tr_quotes.author: William J. H. Boetcker

tr_quotes.quote: Küçük işler, basit insanları mağrur yapar.
tr_quotes.author: Willam Shakespeare

tr_quotes.quote: Hangi işe girersen gir, önce sonunu düşün; sonu düşünülmeyen işler insana zarar getirir.
tr_quotes.author: Yusuf Has Hacip

tr_quotes.quote: İş hayatındaki en büyük yetenek diğerleriyle iyi geçinip onların yaptıklarında etkili olabilmektir.
tr_quotes.author: John Hancock

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer en iyi yüz ticari kuruluşu incelemeye kalkarsanız, eminim büyük bir çoğunluğunun başarısının özgün ve yenilikçi satış metodlarında gizli olduğunu farkedeceksiniz.
tr_quotes.author: W. Alton Jones

tr_quotes.quote: İş hayatı inanç talep eder, ciddiyet gerektirir, yürek ister, dürüstçe bencilliktir, hata affetmez ve hayatın ta kendisidir.
tr_quotes.author: William Feater

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlar ihtiyacı olan şeyleri nadiren alırlar. İnsanlar istediklerini alırlar.
tr_quotes.author: Seth Godin

tr_quotes.quote: Cüretkarca, korkusuzca, pervasızca yaşa. Rekabet içinde olmanın tadını çıkarmak için elinden gelenin en iyisini yap.
tr_quotes.author: Henry J. Kaiser

tr_quotes.quote: İş adamı ticari bir takip içindedir. Ticari olarak takip edilen şey ise paradır.
tr_quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

tr_quotes.quote: Bir iş açmak çok kolaydır; onu açık tutmak ise çok zordur.
tr_quotes.author: Çin Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: İşler asla zor değildir. Yeterki onları küçük parçalara bölebilelim.
tr_quotes.author: Henry Ford

tr_quotes.quote: Milletler orduları yüzünden birbirlerine güvensiz değiller. Birbirlerine güven duymadıkları için orduları var.
tr_quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

tr_quotes.quote: Bir adam sadece para kazanmak fikriyle işe başladıysa, büyük ihtimalle, yapamayacaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Joyce Claude Hall

tr_quotes.quote: İş hayatı sekse benzer. İyi olduğu zaman çok iyidir; pek iyi olmadığı zaman, yinede iyidir.
tr_quotes.author: George Katona

tr_quotes.quote: Fırsatlardan yararlananların baş yardımcıları onları kaçıranlardır.
tr_quotes.author: Özdemir Asaf

tr_quotes.quote: Allah kuşlara rızık verir, fakat kuşlar bu yiyeceği arayıp bulmak zorundadır.
tr_quotes.author: Latin Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Ticaret: Başka bir insanın cebindeki parayı kibarca alabilme sanatı.
tr_quotes.author: Max Amsterdam

tr_quotes.quote: Ne en güçlü olan tür hayatta kalır, ne de en zeki olan, ancak değişime en çok adapte olabilendir hayatta kalan.
tr_quotes.author: Charles Darwin

en_quotes.quote: Great things in business are never done by one person. They're done by a team of people
en_quotes.author: Steve Jobs

en_quotes.quote: A brand for a company is like a reputation for a person. You earn reputation by trying to do hard things well
en_quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

en_quotes.quote: The superior man understands what is right; the inferior man understands what will sell
en_quotes.author: Confucius

en_quotes.quote: Just because something doesn't do what you planned it to do doesn't mean it's useless
en_quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

en_quotes.quote: The golden rule for every business man is this: 'Put yourself in your customer's place.'
en_quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

en_quotes.quote: You can't be successful in business without taking risks. It's really that simple
en_quotes.author: Adena Friedman

en_quotes.quote: Sustainability has to be a way of life to be a way of business
en_quotes.author: Anand Mahindra

en_quotes.quote: I promise you... nobody cares about your business except for you. Nobody
en_quotes.author: Arvind Gupta

en_quotes.quote: As an entrepreneur, I am focused on my business
en_quotes.author: Bhavish Aggarwal

en_quotes.quote: If you listen to your fears, you will die never knowing what a great person you might have been
en_quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

en_quotes.quote: The business of art is to reveal the relation between man and his environment
en_quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

en_quotes.quote: Profitability is coming from productivity, efficiency, management, austerity, and the way to manage the business
en_quotes.author: Carlos Slim

en_quotes.quote: Meetings are indispensable when you don't want to do anything
en_quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

en_quotes.quote: If anything is good for pounding humility into you permanently, it's the restaurant business
en_quotes.author: Anthony Bourdain

en_quotes.quote: So much of life is a negotiation - so even if you're not in business, you have opportunities to practice all around you
en_quotes.author: Kevin O'Leary

en_quotes.quote: It's OK to have your eggs in one basket as long as you control what happens to that basket
en_quotes.author: Elon Musk

en_quotes.quote: I want to put a ding in the universe
en_quotes.author: Steve Jobs

en_quotes.quote: Informed decision-making comes from a long tradition of guessing and then blaming others for inadequate results
en_quotes.author: Scott Adams

en_quotes.quote: Life is an exciting business, and most exciting when it is lived for others
en_quotes.author: Helen Keller

en_quotes.quote: If Satan wasn't around, churches would go out of business
en_quotes.author: Marilyn Manson

en_quotes.quote: The best way to look at any business is from the standpoint of the clients
en_quotes.author: Jamie Dimon

en_quotes.quote: Personal relationships are always the key to good business. You can buy networking; you can't buy friendships
en_quotes.author: Lindsay Fox

en_quotes.quote: Empathy is one of our greatest tools of business that is most underused
en_quotes.author: Daniel Lubetzky

en_quotes.quote: No enterprise is more likely to succeed than one concealed from the enemy until it is ripe for execution
en_quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

en_quotes.quote: All you have in business is your reputation - so it's very important that you keep your word
en_quotes.author: Richard Branson

en_quotes.quote: I learned the life of business, commerce - it's an art
en_quotes.author: Emmanuel Macron

en_quotes.quote: Looking for love is tricky business, like whipping a carousel horse
en_quotes.author: George Cukor

en_quotes.quote: Sales are contingent upon the attitude of the salesman - not the attitude of the prospect
en_quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

en_quotes.quote: It is the artist's business to create sunshine when the sun fails
en_quotes.author: Romain Rolland

en_quotes.quote: There's no reason to be the richest man in the cemetery. You can't do any business from there
en_quotes.author: Colonel Sanders

en_quotes.quote: There's no business like show business, but there are several businesses like accounting
en_quotes.author: David Letterman

en_quotes.quote: I want to put H&M and Zara out of business
en_quotes.author: Jennifer Hyman

en_quotes.quote: If it doesn't sell, it isn't creative
en_quotes.author: David Ogilvy

en_quotes.quote: There's nobody in the business strong enough to scare me
en_quotes.author: Tupac Shakur

en_quotes.quote: If you don't drive your business, you will be driven out of business
en_quotes.author: B. C. Forbes

en_quotes.quote: A satisfied customer is the best business strategy of all
en_quotes.author: Michael LeBoeuf

en_quotes.quote: In the business world, the rearview mirror is always clearer than the windshield
en_quotes.author: Warren Buffett

en_quotes.quote: Don't let your ego get too close to your position, so that if your position gets shot down, your ego doesn't go with it
en_quotes.author: Colin Powell

en_quotes.quote: The greatest ability in business is to get along with others and to influence their actions
en_quotes.author: John Hancock

en_quotes.quote: We're all working together; that's the secret
en_quotes.author: Sam Walton

en_quotes.quote: Cricket is my passion; it is my first love. So I will not act in my movies, as they will just be a side business for me
en_quotes.author: Harbhajan Singh

en_quotes.quote: Content marketing is one of the most effective ways to promote your business online - but only when it's done right
en_quotes.author: John Rampton

en_quotes.quote: Small business people are people with goals and values that can't be calculated on a profit and loss statement
en_quotes.author: Linda McMahon

en_quotes.quote: In the end, all business operations can be reduced to three words: people, product, and profits
en_quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

en_quotes.quote: Justice means minding one's own business and not meddling with other men's concerns
en_quotes.author: Plato

en_quotes.quote: The business schools reward difficult complex behavior more than simple behavior, but simple behavior is more effective
en_quotes.author: Warren Buffett

en_quotes.quote: War is the business of barbarians
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

en_quotes.quote: The wrong personality with the greatest resume in a business will not grow that business
en_quotes.author: Jon Taffer

en_quotes.quote: Punctuality is one of the cardinal business virtues: always insist on it in your subordinates
en_quotes.author: Don Marquis

en_quotes.quote: Your premium brand had better be delivering something special, or it's not going to get the business
en_quotes.author: Warren Buffett

en_quotes.quote: Our main business is not to see what lies dimly at a distance, but to do what lies clearly at hand
en_quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

en_quotes.quote: Business is never so healthy as when, like a chicken, it must do a certain amount of scratching around for what it gets
en_quotes.author: Henry Ford

en_quotes.quote: If you don't understand the details of your business you are going to fail
en_quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

en_quotes.quote: If you owe the bank $100 that's your problem. If you owe the bank $100 million, that's the bank's problem
en_quotes.author: J. Paul Getty

en_quotes.quote: Try, try, try, and keep on trying is the rule that must be followed to become an expert in anything
en_quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

en_quotes.quote: Team synergy has an extraordinary impact on business results
en_quotes.author: Patrick Lencioni

en_quotes.quote: Sustainable fishing is a fraud. It's a marketing term that really means 'business as usual.'
en_quotes.author: Paul Watson

en_quotes.quote: What business do we have telling people who to vote for? They probably know more about it than we do
en_quotes.author: Stan Laurel

en_quotes.quote: Word of mouth is the best medium of all
en_quotes.author: William Bernbach

en_quotes.quote: The purpose of a business is to create a customer
en_quotes.author: Peter Drucker

en_quotes.quote: I am certainly not one of those who need to be prodded. In fact, if anything, I am the prod
en_quotes.author: Winston Churchill

en_quotes.quote: A business absolutely devoted to service will have only one worry about profits. They will be embarrassingly large
en_quotes.author: Henry Ford

en_quotes.quote: My personal life is only my business and the business of the people who are close to me
en_quotes.author: Ileana D'Cruz

en_quotes.quote: Every good business story has a conflict and triumph at the core and a turning point where a transformation takes place
en_quotes.author: Dinesh Paliwal

en_quotes.quote: A business like an automobile, has to be driven, in order to get results
en_quotes.author: B. C. Forbes

en_quotes.quote: On my business card, I am a corporate president. In my mind, I am a computer programmer. But in my heart, I am a gamer
en_quotes.author: Satoru Iwata

en_quotes.quote: A consultant is someone who saves his client almost enough to pay his fee
en_quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasow

en_quotes.quote: Great companies are built on great products
en_quotes.author: Elon Musk

en_quotes.quote: Ideas pull the trigger, but instinct loads the gun
en_quotes.author: Don Marquis

en_quotes.quote: Politics is just like show business. You have a hell of an opening, coast for a while, and then have a hell of a close
en_quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

en_quotes.quote: I just make it my business to get along with people so I can have fun. It's that simple
en_quotes.author: Betty White

en_quotes.quote: People can talk all they want; that doesn't affect how I go about my business
en_quotes.author: Colin Kaepernick

en_quotes.quote: Competition is the keen cutting edge of business, always shaving away at costs
en_quotes.author: Henry Ford

en_quotes.quote: If one does not know to which port one is sailing, no wind is favorable
en_quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

en_quotes.quote: It's safe to say headphones is a good business
en_quotes.author: DJ Khaled

en_quotes.quote: I wear two hats. The one is business and increasing my shareholders' value; the other is social responsibility
en_quotes.author: Guler Sabanci

en_quotes.quote: The true measure of the value of any business leader and manager is performance
en_quotes.author: Brian Tracy

en_quotes.quote: Most of what we call management consists of making it difficult for people to get their work done
en_quotes.author: Peter Drucker

en_quotes.quote: Any business, no matter what it is, lives or dies by the customer reaction it creates
en_quotes.author: Jon Taffer

en_quotes.quote: Punctuality is the soul of business
en_quotes.author: Thomas Chandler Haliburton

en_quotes.quote: Perhaps one of the most important accomplishments of my administration has been minding my own business
en_quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

en_quotes.quote: When in doubt, mumble; when in trouble, delegate; when in charge, ponder
en_quotes.author: James H. Boren

en_quotes.quote: If there's one thing that's certain in business, it's uncertainty
en_quotes.author: Stephen Covey

en_quotes.quote: The consumer isn't a moron; she is your wife
en_quotes.author: David Ogilvy

en_quotes.quote: Appreciate everything your associates do for the business
en_quotes.author: Sam Walton

en_quotes.quote: If you want to kill any idea in the world, get a committee working on it
en_quotes.author: Charles Kettering

en_quotes.quote: Our business is infested with idiots who try to impress by using pretentious jargon
en_quotes.author: David Ogilvy

en_quotes.quote: The names are bigger, the show is worldwide, but I get a royal pass into life in the broadcasting business
en_quotes.author: Larry King

en_quotes.quote: A lot of people in the movie business don't have a point of reference for me; nobody really knows who I am
en_quotes.author: Andre Holland

en_quotes.quote: Tearing apart a community, a business, and a family will make America worse off, every time
en_quotes.author: Pete Buttigieg

en_quotes.quote: I may be kindly, I am ordinarily gentle, but in my line of business I am obliged to will terribly what I will at all
en_quotes.author: Catherine the Great

en_quotes.quote: Embrace your fire - even in hard times. A down economy can actually be a great time to start a business
en_quotes.author: Jean Chatzky

en_quotes.quote: In modern business it is not the crook who is to be feared most, it is the honest man who doesn't know what he is doing
en_quotes.author: William Wordsworth

en_quotes.quote: The whole business is built on ego, vanity, self-satisfaction, and it's total crap to pretend it's not
en_quotes.author: George Michael

en_quotes.quote: I am not yet ready to be Tsar. I know nothing of the business of ruling
en_quotes.author: Nicholas II of Russia

en_quotes.quote: There is not a week that goes by that I don't have a dream that I am back in the business
en_quotes.author: Alan Gerry

en_quotes.quote: Contrary to popular opinion, the hustle is not a new dance step - it is an old business procedure
en_quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

en_quotes.quote: Remember, if your business isn't making money, then you and your employees aren't, either
en_quotes.author: Michael Gerber

en_quotes.quote: I rate enthusiasm even above professional skill
en_quotes.author: Edward Appleton

en_quotes.quote: Childhood is a tricky business. Usually, something goes wrong
en_quotes.author: Maurice Sendak

en_quotes.quote: As a small businessperson, you have no greater leverage than the truth
en_quotes.author: John Greenleaf Whittier

en_quotes.quote: Nobody forces you to work at Wal-Mart. Start your own business! Sell something to Wal-Mart!
en_quotes.author: Kevin O'Leary

en_quotes.quote: I'm in a business where no one cares about anything except how well your last collection sold
en_quotes.author: Calvin Klein

en_quotes.quote: The herd instinct among forecasters makes sheep look like independent thinkers
en_quotes.author: Edgar Fiedler

en_quotes.quote: Ask five economists and you'll get five different answers - six if one went to Harvard
en_quotes.author: Edgar Fiedler

en_quotes.quote: The pursuit of eternity is no longer the prerogative of the gods - it is the business of us all, here and now
en_quotes.author: Bob Brown

en_quotes.quote: I buy when other people are selling
en_quotes.author: J. Paul Getty

en_quotes.quote: Industry is fortune's right hand, and frugality its left
en_quotes.author: John Ray

en_quotes.quote: Business is a team sport
en_quotes.author: Greg Brenneman

en_quotes.quote: In the luxury business, you have to build on heritage
en_quotes.author: Bernard Arnault

en_quotes.quote: Prophesy is a good line of business, but it is full of risks
en_quotes.author: Mark Twain

en_quotes.quote: Politics is not a game. It is an earnest business
en_quotes.author: Winston Churchill

en_quotes.quote: I believe you have to be willing to be misunderstood if you're going to innovate
en_quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

en_quotes.quote: When you see corruption, when you see injustice, you speak up. You don't just shut up and say it's none of my business
en_quotes.author: Manal al-Sharif

en_quotes.quote: Time is the scarcest resource and unless it is managed nothing else can be managed
en_quotes.author: Peter Drucker

en_quotes.quote: This photographing is really the business of stealing
en_quotes.author: Diane Arbus

en_quotes.quote: Joy is the serious business of Heaven
en_quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

en_quotes.quote: If I don't get along with Democrats, I'm sort of, like, out of business
en_quotes.author: Donald Trump

en_quotes.quote: There is no time for cut-and-dried monotony. There is time for work. And time for love. That leaves no other time!
en_quotes.author: Coco Chanel

en_quotes.quote: Only he is successful in his business who makes that pursuit which affords him the highest pleasure sustain him
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: A shady business never yields a sunny life
en_quotes.author: B. C. Forbes

en_quotes.quote: It's none of their business that you have to learn how to write. Let them think you were born that way
en_quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

en_quotes.quote: I am careful not to confuse excellence with perfection. Excellence I can reach for; perfection is God's business
en_quotes.author: Michael J. Fox

en_quotes.quote: Management teams aren't good at asking questions. In business school, we train them to be good at giving answers
en_quotes.author: Clayton M. Christensen

en_quotes.quote: The keystone of successful business is cooperation. Friction retards progress
en_quotes.author: James Cash Penney

en_quotes.quote: Business has only two functions - marketing and innovation
en_quotes.author: Milan Kundera

en_quotes.quote: I may be president of the United States, but my private life is nobody's damned business
en_quotes.author: Chester A. Arthur

en_quotes.quote: Let all your things have their places; let each part of your business have its time
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: I happened to come along in the music business when there was no trend
en_quotes.author: Elvis Presley

en_quotes.quote: We take the hamburger business more seriously than anyone else
en_quotes.author: Ray Kroc

en_quotes.quote: The only business of the head in the world is to bow a ceaseless obeisance to the heart
en_quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

en_quotes.quote: If you're a sponsor, and you're doing business globally, to bring your guests to South Florida is pretty nice
en_quotes.author: Wayne Huizenga

en_quotes.quote: I do not believe a man can ever leave his business. He ought to think of it by day and dream of it by night
en_quotes.author: Henry Ford

en_quotes.quote: The first mistake in public business is the going into it
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: If you cannot work with love but only with distaste, it is better that you should leave your work
en_quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

en_quotes.quote: We don't seem to be able to check crime, so why not legalize it and then tax it out of business?
en_quotes.author: Will Rogers

en_quotes.quote: The successful man is the one who finds out what is the matter with his business before his competitors do
en_quotes.author: Roy L. Smith

en_quotes.quote: Business today consists in persuading crowds
en_quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

en_quotes.quote: The successful business executive can handle challenges and solve problems at a remarkable clip
en_quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

en_quotes.quote: Start a part-time business and make as many mistakes as you possibly can while you still have your daytime job
en_quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

en_quotes.quote: It's not what you pay a man, but what he costs you that counts
en_quotes.author: Will Rogers

en_quotes.quote: No person will make a great business who wants to do it all himself or get all the credit
en_quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

en_quotes.quote: Unless you can fake sincerity, you'll get nowhere in this business
en_quotes.author: Roger Stone

en_quotes.quote: Details create the big picture
en_quotes.author: Sanford I. Weill

en_quotes.quote: This free will business is a bit terrifying anyway. It's almost pleasanter to obey, and make the most of it
en_quotes.author: Ugo Betti

en_quotes.quote: I never called my work an 'art'. It's part of show business, the business of building entertainment
en_quotes.author: Walt Disney

en_quotes.quote: It is awfully important to know what is and what is not your business
en_quotes.author: Gertrude Stein

en_quotes.quote: For the merchant, even honesty is a financial speculation
en_quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

en_quotes.quote: If you can build a business up big enough, it's respectable
en_quotes.author: Will Rogers

en_quotes.quote: The movies are the only business where you can go out front and applaud yourself
en_quotes.author: Will Rogers

en_quotes.quote: Music is spiritual. The music business is not
en_quotes.author: Van Morrison

en_quotes.quote: Carpe per diem - seize the check
en_quotes.author: Robin Williams

en_quotes.quote: Hell, there are no rules here - we're trying to accomplish something
en_quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

en_quotes.quote: If you spend your life competing with business men, what do you have? A bank account and ulcers!
en_quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

en_quotes.quote: Starting a business is not for everyone. Starting a business - I'd say, number one is have a high pain threshold
en_quotes.author: Elon Musk

en_quotes.quote: If I love you, what business is it of yours?
en_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

en_quotes.quote: An economist's guess is liable to be as good as anybody else's
en_quotes.author: Will Rogers

en_quotes.quote: I get to play golf for a living. What more can you ask for - getting paid for doing what you love
en_quotes.author: Tiger Woods

en_quotes.quote: I myself am a parent in a small business. Number of employees: one
en_quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

en_quotes.quote: If you're as honest and fair as you can be, not only in business but in life, things will work out
en_quotes.author: Kate Spade

en_quotes.quote: If you deprive yourself of outsourcing and your competitors do not, you're putting yourself out of business
en_quotes.author: Lee Kuan Yew

en_quotes.quote: In this business, you gotta hustle
en_quotes.author: Tiny Tim

en_quotes.quote: The profession of book writing makes horse racing seem like a solid, stable business
en_quotes.author: John Steinbeck

en_quotes.quote: I must create a system or be enslaved by another mans; I will not reason and compare: my business is to create
en_quotes.author: William Blake

en_quotes.quote: Young lawyers attend the courts, not because they have business there, but because they have no business
en_quotes.author: Washington Irving

en_quotes.quote: Girls shouldn't worry about being the equal of men in the business world
en_quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

en_quotes.quote: The things most people want to know about are usually none of their business
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: The challenge of the retail business is the human condition
en_quotes.author: Howard Schultz

en_quotes.quote: My vision is to build an e-commerce ecosystem that allows consumers and businesses to do all aspects of business online
en_quotes.author: Jack Ma

en_quotes.quote: I'm always a fan of good business moves
en_quotes.author: Future

en_quotes.quote: Steve Jobs once asked me for some advice about retail, but I said, 'I am not sure at all we are in the same business.'
en_quotes.author: Bernard Arnault

en_quotes.quote: Wise are those who learn that the bottom line doesn't always have to be their top priority
en_quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

en_quotes.quote: The business of feeding people is the most amazing business in the world
en_quotes.author: Jose Andres

en_quotes.quote: Follow sound business trends, not fashion trends
en_quotes.author: Janice Dickinson

en_quotes.quote: When people take advantage of you and make a business out of it, that's not nice
en_quotes.author: Edgardo Osorio

en_quotes.quote: In tough times, one has to see if the fundamentals of the business are good or not
en_quotes.author: Naveen Tewari

en_quotes.quote: Everyone's got unfinished business with Barcelona. They're the greatest team in the world
en_quotes.author: Frank Lampard

en_quotes.quote: The best decision I ever made, period, was to get into the music business
en_quotes.author: Ja Rule

en_quotes.quote: Now I say that with cruelty and oppression it is everybody's business to interfere when they see it
en_quotes.author: Anna Sewell

en_quotes.quote: The work of the individual still remains the spark that moves mankind ahead even more than teamwork
en_quotes.author: Igor Sikorsky

en_quotes.quote: Let your Discourse with Men of Business be Short and Comprehensive
en_quotes.author: George Washington

en_quotes.quote: Regard it as just as desirable to build a chicken house as to build a cathedral
en_quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

en_quotes.quote: The way I run my business seems to be easier than the way I run my life
en_quotes.author: Donald Trump

en_quotes.quote: When you're eight years old nothing is your business
en_quotes.author: Lenny Bruce

en_quotes.quote: Profit is the most global aspect of a business, and it is cross-functional
en_quotes.author: Carlos Ghosn

en_quotes.quote: I think any opportunity you have to be green, whether it's in business or in everyday life, you should take it
en_quotes.author: Lauren Conrad

en_quotes.quote: Business is all about risk taking and managing uncertainties and turbulence
en_quotes.author: Gautam Adani

en_quotes.quote: Intellectual property has the shelf life of a banana
en_quotes.author: Bill Gates

en_quotes.quote: In business or in life, don't follow the wagon tracks too closely
en_quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: More business is lost every year through neglect than through any other cause
en_quotes.author: Rose Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: Let us permit nature to have her way. She understands her business better than we do
en_quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

en_quotes.quote: Being beautiful is not so fun when you're in a business with all men
en_quotes.author: Lady Gaga

en_quotes.quote: Test fast, fail fast, adjust fast
en_quotes.author: Tom Peters

en_quotes.quote: If a business does well, the stock eventually follows
en_quotes.author: Warren Buffett

en_quotes.quote: Our favorite holding period is forever
en_quotes.author: Warren Buffett

en_quotes.quote: An advertising agency is 85 percent confusion and 15 percent commission
en_quotes.author: Fred Allen

en_quotes.quote: Don't go getting mixed up in the business of your betters, or you'll land in trouble too big for you
en_quotes.author: J. R. R. Tolkien

en_quotes.quote: An organization, no matter how well designed, is only as good as the people who live and work in it
en_quotes.author: Dee Hock

en_quotes.quote: Learn to bet on yourself and have confidence in your own decisions. No one knows your business better than you
en_quotes.author: Leah Busque

en_quotes.quote: In business, the competition will bite you if you keep running, if you stand still, they will swallow you
en_quotes.author: Victor Kiam

en_quotes.quote: No one on his deathbed ever said, I wish I had spent more time on my business
en_quotes.author: Paul Tsongas

en_quotes.quote: It's unwise in business to have one client or two clients. It's unwise in electricity to have one source or two sources
en_quotes.author: Scott Pruitt

en_quotes.quote: There is so much headache and hassle involved in starting a business or running a business
en_quotes.author: Parker Conrad

en_quotes.quote: We are not in the business of iron ore. Whatever captive iron ore sources we have, we use it to make steel
en_quotes.author: Lakshmi Mittal

en_quotes.quote: The great leaders are like the best conductors - they reach beyond the notes to reach the magic in the players
en_quotes.author: Blaine Lee

en_quotes.quote: The meek shall inherit the Earth, but not its mineral rights
en_quotes.author: J. Paul Getty

en_quotes.quote: Reason and judgment are the qualities of a leader
en_quotes.author: Tacitus

en_quotes.quote: Business is about people. It's about passion. It's about bold ideas, bold small ideas or bold large ideas
en_quotes.author: Tom Peters

en_quotes.quote: We cannot make events. Our business is wisely to improve them
en_quotes.author: Samuel Adams

en_quotes.quote: Everybody's business is nobody's business, and nobody's business is my business
en_quotes.author: Clara Barton

en_quotes.quote: The business of America is business
en_quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

en_quotes.quote: The secret of business is to know something that nobody else knows
en_quotes.author: Aristotle Onassis

en_quotes.quote: My father told me, never have partners
en_quotes.author: Howard Hughes

en_quotes.quote: We applaud any company making business decisions that empower women
en_quotes.author: Whitney Wolfe Herd

en_quotes.quote: In this business, if you don't pay your debts you're finished
en_quotes.author: Roger Stone

en_quotes.quote: I'm not in the business of reading tea leaves. I don't have a crystal ball
en_quotes.author: Christine Lagarde

en_quotes.quote: Every young man would do well to remember that all successful business stands on the foundation of morality
en_quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

en_quotes.quote: Farming's always been my business
en_quotes.author: Howlin' Wolf

en_quotes.quote: Speak to Him often of your business, your plans, your troubles, your fears - of everything that concerns you
en_quotes.author: Alphonsus Liguori

en_quotes.quote: My juices needed restoring. I needed a sabbatical from the record business
en_quotes.author: Norman Granz

en_quotes.quote: I should be paid to go out. You see, I'm good for business. I class up a joint
en_quotes.author: Rene Ricard

en_quotes.quote: Yes, we can do business in Nepal and still succeed. That is what I proved
en_quotes.author: Binod Chaudhary

en_quotes.quote: I don't think it's a good idea to plan to sell a company
en_quotes.author: Elon Musk

en_quotes.quote: I don't create companies for the sake of creating companies, but to get things done
en_quotes.author: Elon Musk

en_quotes.quote: Employees make the best dates. You don't have to pick them up and they're always tax-deductible
en_quotes.author: Andy Warhol

en_quotes.quote: Nothing so conclusively proves a man's ability to lead others as what he does from day to day to lead himself
en_quotes.author: Thomas J. Watson

en_quotes.quote: Whenever an individual or a business decides that success has been attained, progress stops
en_quotes.author: Thomas J. Watson

en_quotes.quote: I find it rather easy to portray a businessman. Being bland, rather cruel and incompetent comes naturally to me
en_quotes.author: John Cleese

en_quotes.quote: An economist is an expert who will know tomorrow why the things he predicted yesterday didn't happen today
en_quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

en_quotes.quote: I never really studied business in school. I kind of wish I had, but how boring is that?
en_quotes.author: Mick Jagger

en_quotes.quote: I want to be remembered as the football player I was. The private person is nobody's business
en_quotes.author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

en_quotes.quote: I see a lot of opportunity in Internet-related start-ups, and second is the solar business
en_quotes.author: Masayoshi Son

en_quotes.quote: So little done, so much to do
en_quotes.author: Cecil Rhodes

en_quotes.quote: I'm not in the business of warning people
en_quotes.author: John Bercow

en_quotes.quote: I'm not a driven businessman, but a driven artist. I never think about money. Beautiful things make money
en_quotes.author: John Dalberg-Acton

en_quotes.quote: The fundamentals of your business are like free throws: emphasize and practice them to perfection
en_quotes.author: Cathy Engelbert

en_quotes.quote: You get traded. It happens. It's part of the business
en_quotes.author: Jimmy Butler

en_quotes.quote: A revised schedule is to business what a new season is to an athlete or a new canvas to an artist
en_quotes.author: Norman Ralph Augustine

en_quotes.quote: We got extremely lucky. It's a tough business to work with
en_quotes.author: Lloyd Banks

en_quotes.quote: A bankruptcy judge can fix your balance sheet, but he cannot fix your company
en_quotes.author: Gordon Bethune

en_quotes.quote: My father had the main barber- and beauty-supply business in the African-American community in Buffalo
en_quotes.author: Helene D. Gayle

en_quotes.quote: We are in the business of gathering the news. We're not in the business of talking about the news
en_quotes.author: Aaron Brown

en_quotes.quote: I really want to get into the clothing business
en_quotes.author: Eva Gutowski

en_quotes.quote: Business news is sexy
en_quotes.author: Maria Bartiromo

en_quotes.quote: One's mind has a way of making itself up in the background, and it suddenly becomes clear what one means to do
en_quotes.author: A. C. Benson

en_quotes.quote: Our customers' business interests are heavily dependent on the oil and gas industry
en_quotes.author: Karen Katz

en_quotes.quote: It's called a pen. It's like a printer, hooked straight to my brain
en_quotes.author: Dale Dauten

en_quotes.quote: Let me tell you quite bluntly that this king business has given me personally nothing but headaches
en_quotes.author: Mohammed Reza Pahlavi

en_quotes.quote: I never expect business to be easy
en_quotes.author: Pier Luigi Loro Piana

en_quotes.quote: We've got a low turnover management group and executive group who've grown up in the business
en_quotes.author: Fred L. Turner

en_quotes.quote: If you fire people, you fire customers
en_quotes.author: Ferdinand Piech

en_quotes.quote: The gambling known as business looks with austere disfavor upon the business known as gambling
en_quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

en_quotes.quote: Corporation: An ingenious device for obtaining profit without individual responsibility
en_quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

en_quotes.quote: Remind people that profit is the difference between revenue and expense. This makes you look smart
en_quotes.author: Scott Adams

en_quotes.quote: A company is only as good as the people it keeps
en_quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

en_quotes.quote: When times are bad is when the real entrepreneurs emerge
en_quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

en_quotes.quote: Business is a combination of war and sport
en_quotes.author: Andre Maurois

en_quotes.quote: My son is now an 'entrepreneur.' That's what you're called when you don't have a job
en_quotes.author: Ted Turner

en_quotes.quote: We don't have a monopoly. We have market share. There's a difference
en_quotes.author: Steve Ballmer

en_quotes.quote: What we've gone through in the last several years has caused some people to question 'Can we trust Microsoft?'
en_quotes.author: Steve Ballmer

en_quotes.quote: Exchange ideas frequently
en_quotes.author: James Cash Penney

en_quotes.quote: Don't simply retire from something; have something to retire to
en_quotes.author: Harry Emerson Fosdick

en_quotes.quote: The opportunity is often lost by deliberating
en_quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

en_quotes.quote: I don't think meals have any business being deductible. I'm for separation of calories and corporations
en_quotes.author: Ralph Nader

en_quotes.quote: If you have one good idea, people will lend you twenty
en_quotes.author: Marie von Ebner-Eschenbach

en_quotes.quote: Inside every working anarchy, there's an Old Boy Network
en_quotes.author: Mitch Kapor

en_quotes.quote: Lots of folks confuse bad management with destiny
en_quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

en_quotes.quote: People will buy anything that is 'one to a customer.'
en_quotes.author: Sinclair Lewis

en_quotes.quote: The buck stops with the guy who signs the checks
en_quotes.author: Rupert Murdoch

en_quotes.quote: Every day I get up and look through the Forbes list of the richest people in America. If I'm not there, I go to work
en_quotes.author: Robert Orben

en_quotes.quote: The invisible hand of the market always moves faster and better than the heavy hand of government
en_quotes.author: Mitt Romney

en_quotes.quote: Never argue with a profit
en_quotes.author: Jeff Rich

en_quotes.quote: A group or an artist shouldn't get his money until his boss gets his
en_quotes.author: Bobby Darin

en_quotes.quote: To command is to serve, nothing more and nothing less
en_quotes.author: Andre Malraux

en_quotes.quote: That's the trick in this business: if you want longevity, just keep people guessing a little bit
en_quotes.author: Kelsey Grammer

en_quotes.quote: The fastest way to succeed is to look as if you're playing by somebody else's rules, while quietly playing by your own
en_quotes.author: Michael Korda

en_quotes.quote: If you have to forecast, forecast often
en_quotes.author: Edgar Fiedler

en_quotes.quote: If an actor knows how to milk a cow, I always know it will not be difficult to be in business with him
en_quotes.author: Werner Herzog

en_quotes.quote: First-rate people hire first-rate people; second-rate people hire third-rate people
en_quotes.author: Leo Rosten

en_quotes.quote: Markets change, tastes change, so the companies and the individuals who choose to compete in those markets must change
en_quotes.author: An Wang

en_quotes.quote: The final test of a leader is that he leaves behind him in other men the conviction and the will to carry on
en_quotes.author: Walter Lippmann

en_quotes.quote: Family farms and small businesses are the backbone of our communities
en_quotes.author: Tom Allen

en_quotes.quote: A manager doesn't hear the cheers
en_quotes.author: Alvin Dark

en_quotes.quote: Business must be the solution, not the problem
en_quotes.author: Dennis Weaver

en_quotes.quote: Business can be a source of progressive change
en_quotes.author: Jerry Greenfield

en_quotes.quote: Go to your business, pleasure, whilst I go to my pleasure, business
en_quotes.author: William Wycherley

en_quotes.quote: Don't worry about people stealing your ideas. If your ideas are any good, you'll have to ram them down people's throats
en_quotes.author: Howard Aiken

en_quotes.quote: Cannibals prefer those who have no spines
en_quotes.author: Stanislaw Lem

en_quotes.quote: If you want improvements in coal, you've got to keep people in the business
en_quotes.author: Matt Mead

en_quotes.quote: Business is in itself a power
en_quotes.author: Garet Garrett

en_quotes.quote: Our new attitude is how can we put you in front of our customer
en_quotes.author: Terry Semel

en_quotes.quote: Only a monopolist could study a business and ruin it by giving away products
en_quotes.author: Scott McNealy

en_quotes.quote: The incestuous relationship between government and big business thrives in the dark
en_quotes.author: Jack Anderson

en_quotes.quote: The leader who exercises power with honor will work from the inside out, starting with himself
en_quotes.author: Blaine Lee
